name: Simmons_Upholstery_Beachfront_Froth_Queen_Sleeper
description: Upgrade your living decor with the addition of this beige Simmons upholstery three over two queen hide-a-bed with a contrast welt, rolled flared arm, attached back cushion, and accented with 4 toss pillows. Features: Hardwood frame, sinuous wire springs and high-density foam seat cushions for comfortable seating.
